titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: NODAL STATUS OF TUMOUR NUMBER OF POSITIVE LYMPH NODES SAMPLED - Description

div.p: NODAL STATUS OF TUMOUR NUMBER OF POSITIVE LYMPH NODES SAMPLED is the total number of lymph nodes sampled with a LYMPH NODE STATUS recorded as National Code 'lymph node positive'.
NODAL STATUS OF TUMOUR NUMBER OF POSITIVE LYMPH NODES SAMPLED applies to invasive cancers only.
